monogr.title: A briefe exhortation to all men to set their houses in order. By William Iones B. of D. Preacher to the Isle of Wight

div.head: TO THE RIGHT HONOVRABLE, RICHARD LORD WESTON, LORD HIGH TREASVRER OF ENGLAND, CAPTAINE OF THE ISLE OF WIGHT: AND TO THE RIGHT WORSHIPFVLL THE BARONETS, KNIGHTS AND GENTLEMEN: AND TO HIS LOVING BRETHREN THE MINISTERS: AND TO ALL THE INHABITANTS OF THE ISLE OF WIGHT.
div.p: WILLIAM IONES THEIR DEVOTED SERVANT VVISHETH VVELL-ORDERED FAMILIES ON EARTH, AND EVERLASTING HAPPINES IN HEAVEN.
